ThingDef.label: deprecated jeans (ERROR)
ThingDef.description: People like Oskar and the Biomes Mod development board HATE integration and compatibility. People like me have to deal with this because they are too good for "lesser Mods". Friends don't let their friends use duplicates. If you see this in your game, alert TurtleShroom. \n \n If this is detected within the game, an error has occured, because TurtleShroom did not clean out all references to the Vanilla Apparel Expanded Mod's Jeans Thing Def. It is not supposed to exist if you have the Rimworld Westernization Project installed.
